miniapp.name: LORE MACHINE
miniapp.subtitle: Decentralized Collaborative Lore Generator
miniapp.description: Transform meme momentum into canonical community IP. Submit one line of lore, vote with $LORE points, and earn rewards when your line becomes canon. Stories become fractionalized NFTs on Base.
miniapp.tagline: Transform meme momentum into canonical IP
miniapp.ogDescription: Decentralized collaborative lore generator for Base tokens. Submit, vote, and earn rewards as stories become canonical community IP.
